title: The OTP scam - How people are getting scammed
selftext:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BSM6-gET8Vo&ab\_channel=NDTV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BSM6-gET8Vo&ab_channel=NDTV)

This NDTV video shows how people are getting scammed on daily basis and what tricks these scammers deploy to loot us. 

I would urge all of us to watch this video and share it so that it can increase the awareness. No matter how much alert, vigilant or educated you are, while in fear you could become weak very easily and give in to these scammers. 

In 2014, I was *nearly* scammed when I was trying to search for another job. I am myself someone who is quite alert about these things but how convincing these guys could be is commendable. 

Please be alert, don't act over smart in thinking that it cannot happen to you!
